Meet Daisuke, a male teacher at an all female school of young well endowed women. Daisuke's job is to help these girls fit into their career of choice by assisting them in a one on one role play. It doesn't take long for Daisuke to give into his temptations (and those giant breasts) and start role playing something else with the girls. Soon he his found out by his busty female supervisor about the actions he has taken with the female students, and does she have a lesson for him.

If you are a fan of harem and big breasts then this is a must have for you. It's a Japan Anime release so there is no dub unfortunately but the animation is top notch regardless. Pick up the sequel as well "Boin Lecture 2" for more boobies action.
